data.name: FreeStyleFootball - Liu Package
data.detailed_description:
Special Character Liu Package

The following items are included:
• Special Character Liu
• 30,000 Points
• XP which is equal to Level 40


Note
Poistion of Liu is selectable, but it's best suited for FW.
Liu is a typical Header player with high heights and Jump ability, Liu also has speed to run into right place.


How to use
DLC items will be sent to your mailbox when purchased.
As you use DLC package item from item locker, you will receive 30,000 points instantly.
XP is included in the character item. It will be automatically used as you create the character.

English*, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window XP
  • Processor: P4 2.8GHz
  • Graphics: Geforce 6200
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 7
  • Processor: P4 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
